title: GE Appliances Employee Performance Analyzer
description: Internal tool for analyzing employee timesheet data to identify top and bottom performers based on punctuality and work duration adherence to 9-5 schedule

pages.name: Upload
pages.purpose: Drag-and-drop CSV file upload with validation and visual feedback

pages.name: Dashboard
pages.purpose: Performance dashboard showing top/bottom performers with detailed analytics

ui_components: DragDropZone with GE branding and file validation
libraries: Chart.js for progress rings and bar charts
interactions: Drag CSV file onto upload zone triggers Papa Parse validation
Parse CSV and calculate punctuality scores based on 9:00 AM arrival
Calculate average daily hours and flag sub-8-hour days
Toggle high contrast mode updates all color schemes
Click export PDF generates report with charts and data
Sort table columns updates employee display order
Keyboard navigation supports tab order and screen readers
acceptance_criteria: CSV must contain employee_name, date, clock_in_time, clock_out_time columns
Punctuality score calculated as percentage of on-time arrivals by 9:00 AM
Average daily hours calculated excluding weekends
Top performer has highest punctuality score and consistent hours
Bottom performer has lowest punctuality score with explanations
PDF export includes all charts and employee table
Responsive design works on 320px mobile to 1920px desktop
High contrast mode meets WCAG 2.1 AA standards
Loading states announced to screen readers
All interactive elements have ARIA labels
